_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three urgent duties of a farmer [an3: Swiftly making sure the field is well ploughed and tilled
Swiftly irrigating or draining the field
The three urgent duties of a mendicant [: Undertaking the training in the higher ethics
Undertaking the training in the higher mind
Undertaking the training in the higher wisdom
